sentences.sContent: The deficit had grown with the connivance of the banks.
sentences.sCn: 在银行纵容下，赤字增加。

sentences.sContent: The goods were exported with official connivance.
sentences.sCn: 这些商品出口有官方的默认。

words.tran: 纵容；默许；假装不见；共谋（connive的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 假装不见, 纵容, 默许
trans.tranOther: Connivance is a willingness to allow or assist something to happen even though you know it is wrong
